SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics

Class TableConfig

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics.TableConfig
public class TableConfig extends Object
Defines the physical dimensions and scale factors for the pool table setup.

The TableConfig provides geometric parameters such as table size, rail thickness, ball radius, and pocket layout scales. These values are consumed by components like TableBuilder and BallFactory to construct the simulation accurately.

Instances of this class are created using the TableConfig.Builder for clarity and flexibility.
